experience.title: Marketing Intern
experience.description: •	Strategized the CRM and Loyalty plan for the client and get the client’s consensus on the same, based on the client’s marketing requirements and their past data study•	Executed the CRM campaigns based on the customer’s ordering patterns, behavior & loyalty with the end-objective to increase the client’s sales through repeat purchases

experience.title: Sales Assistant
experience.description: •	Communicated the brand to customers and Provided them strong service which ensured a high rate of repeat customers, generated sales, and helped in reaching the Monthly Sales target•	Prioritized tasks in a high-volume environment and managed customer transactions and check out processes to ensure that the store is running efficiently
experience.description_html: • Communicated the brand to customers and Provided them strong service which ensured a high rate of repeat customers, generated sales, and helped in reaching the Monthly Sales target• Prioritized tasks in a high-volume environment and managed customer transactions and check out processes to ensure that the store is running efficiently <!---->

experience.title: Consulting Project
experience.description: •	Led a multi-national 5-member team to analyze the company’s market positioning based on its marketing, business model, and advertising strategies and that of its competitors (Hubspot, Wordstream, Adespresso), got an insight into customer service and clients•	Produced a written report on the content/inbound marketing strategies of top B2B SaaS companies and provided recommendations to ensure better performance of the company •	Surveyed the potential customers to carry out market research and gain a deep understanding of the target customers (related to pricing and product)
experience.description_html: • Led a multi-national 5-member team to analyze the company’s market positioning based on its marketing, business model, and advertising strategies and that of its competitors (Hubspot, Wordstream, Adespresso), got an insight into customer service and clients• Produced a written report on the content/inbound marketing strategies of top B2B SaaS companies and provided recommendations to ensure better performance of the company • Surveyed the potential customers to carry out market research and gain a deep understanding of the target customers (related to pricing and product)

experience.title: Content Writer
experience.description: •	Created and Edited highly engaging digital content based on feedback provided by Marketing team•	Worked with senior team members to schedule and post across the website, and to develop a layout for various content and communication pieces•	Performed extensive web research to collect pertinent data and gather images related to the assigned article

education.title: Cass Business School
education.description: Activities and Societies: Event Manager at CASS Supply Chain Society Modules Include : Accounting and Finance, Principles of Marketing and Strategy, Organizational Behaviour and Human Resource Management, Quantitative Methods for Business, Business and Managerial Economics, Practising Management in Digital Age, Leadership and Change Dissertation Topic : Use of Social Media in helping International Students get a job in the UK
